participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and fun-loving, enjoys gaming and creative activities.
participant_1.background: i like donuts. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i play a lot of call of duty.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nostalgic, with a passion for dance and music from her childhood.
participant_2.background: i take dance lessons once a week. i love new kids on the block. i was born in the early 80 s. i also like old school hip hop. my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite.
